title: v1.6.4.5 Quick Tab Debounce Patterns
details:
Multi-issue Quick Tabs Manager fixes in v1.6.4.5:

1. VisibilityHandler Debounce Pattern:
- Use _pendingMinimize/_pendingRestore Sets to track pending operations
- Use _debounceTimers Map for per-tab 150ms debounce
- Prevents 200+ duplicate minimize events per click
- Always call _debouncedPersist() after minimize/restore

2. UICoordinator Restore Pattern:
- Use _applySnapshotForRestore() to apply saved position/size before rendering
- Get snapshot from minimizedManager.getSnapshot(id)
- Prevents duplicate DOM elements at default (100,100) position

3. closeMinimizedTabs Pattern (sidebar):
- Collect minimized tab IDs BEFORE filtering state
- Send CLOSE_QUICK_TAB to ALL browser tabs for each minimized ID
- Ensures content.js calls closeById() for full DOM cleanup

Key: storage.onChanged is primary sync mechanism - storage writes MUST complete for Manager to update indicators.
